doc.name: scrollerDidScroll
doc.summary: Sent when the properties of a scroller have changed.

example.p: put "Scrolled to" && pHScroll & comma & pVScroll into field "scroller status"

history.changed: Updated to include support for android

description.overview: The scrollerDidScroll message is sent when the scroll properties of a scroller control created using the mobileControlCreate command change.

parameter.name: hScroll
parameter.description: The horizontal scroll of an iOS scroller control.

parameter.name: vScroll
parameter.description: The vertical scroll of an iOS scroller control.

description.comments:
Handle the scrollerDidScroll message if you want to move LiveCode controls, make changes to the interface or set the appropriate scroll properties of groups and fields to get a native scrolling effect.
The scrollerDidScroll message is sent to the object containing the script that created the scroller control.
